meanings.definition: A decorative necklace or chain worn around the neck.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful carcanets to the party.
meanings.sent2: The queen's carcanets sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The carcanets looked like a shimmering river around her neck.
meanings.sent4: Her carcanets held memories of love and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The carcanets gleamed like a constellation of stars.

meanings.definition: A type of jewelry typically made of precious metals and gemstones.
meanings.sent1: The carcanets were crafted with exquisite care.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the carcanets.
meanings.sent3: The carcanets seemed to whisper stories of ancient times.
meanings.sent4: His carcanets shone brighter than the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The carcanets were a treasure beyond compare.

meanings.definition: A piece of jewelry worn as a fashion accessory.
meanings.sent1: Her carcanets added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured stunning carcanets on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The carcanets completed her look with a touch of glamour.
meanings.sent4: His carcanets were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: She felt like a queen wearing the exquisite carcanets.
